Title: Waitlist Email Notifications Never Sent
Description: Users approved for the waitlist never receive email notifications. The buildWaitlistInviteEmail() function exists in /apps/web/lib/waitlist/invite.ts but is never called. The approval endpoint sends no email.

Title: Waitlist Approval Frontend/Backend Status Mismatch
Description: Frontend expects status 'invited' after approval but backend returns 'claimed'. Frontend (useApproveEntry.ts:40) expects inviteToken but backend never returns it.

Title: Missing Waitlist Invite Records & Claim Token Generation
Description: Approval endpoint never creates waitlistInvites records or generates claim tokens. The /claim/{token} route has no data to process. Table exists in schema but is never populated.

Title: Missing Waitlist Cron Job for Email Delivery
Description: No cron job exists to process and send waitlist invite emails. Reference exists in validation schema but /api/cron/waitlist-invites route is missing.

Title: Notifications Always Enabled Bug (|| true)
Description: Logic error in useProfileShell.ts:46 - notificationsEnabled = forceNotificationsEnabled || true || forceNotifications. The || true makes this always true regardless of flags.

Title: Missing Admin Verification Endpoint
Description: Admins cannot verify creator profiles. isVerified field exists in profiles schema but no API endpoint to update it. Need POST /api/admin/verify-profile endpoint.

Title: OG Image is 62-byte Placeholder
Description: Default Open Graph image at /public/og/default.png is only 62 bytes - a broken placeholder. Should be 1200x630px for proper social media previews.

Title: Bio Field Missing from Profile Edit UI
Description: Users cannot edit their bio through settings UI even though API supports it. Bio textarea missing from SettingsProfileSection.tsx component.

Title: Homepage Components Unnecessarily Client-Side
Description: RedesignedHero, ProblemSection, InsightSection, WhatYouGetSection marked 'use client' but have no interactivity. Prevents SSR streaming and increases bundle size.

Title: Auth Gate Logic Scattered Across Codebase
Description: Waitlist/auth gating duplicated in proxy-state.ts, app/layout.tsx, onboarding/page.tsx, claim/page.tsx instead of using centralized gate.ts. Risk of bypass.

Title: Script Bundle Near Capacity
Description: JavaScript bundle at 1455KB of 1600KB budget (91%). Only 145KB headroom for new features. Need bundle analysis and optimization.

Title: Missing E2E Tests for Core Launch Flows
Description: No E2E coverage for: Admin UI, profile editing, handle management race conditions, waitlist full flow, public profile SSR. Risk of regressions.

Title: No Dynamic OG Images for User Profiles
Description: User profile social shares show generic preview instead of personalized image with avatar and name. Need @vercel/og implementation.

Title: Avatar URL Fetch Has 10s Timeout
Description: Profile update blocks on avatar URL fetch with 10s timeout. Should reduce to 3-5s or make non-blocking with background processing.
